INSERT INTO transaction( ID_CUS, TYPE, START_DT, END_DT, CAR_NAME, CAR_COLOR, CAR_MODEL, CAR_NUM, CAR_ABOUT, FEE_EQUIP, FEE_WORK, FEE_TOTAL, STATUS )VALUES( #{ID_CUS}, #{TYPE}, #{START_DT}, #{END_DT}, #{CAR_NAME}, #{CAR_COLOR}, #{CAR_MODEL}, #{CAR_NUM}, #{CAR_ABOUT}, #{FEE_EQUIP}, #{FEE_WORK}, #{FEE_TOTAL}, #{STATUS} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() as returnedId
INSERT INTO trans_equip( ID_TRANS, ID_EQUIP, QUANTITY_EQUIP, PRICE_TOTAL )VALUES( #{ID_TRANS}, #{ID_EQUIP}, #{QUANTITY_EQUIP}, #{PRICE_TOTAL} )
mapper.select: SELECT A.ID AS ID_TRANS, A.START_DT, A.END_DT, A.CAR_NAME, A.CAR_NUM, A.STATUS, B.ID AS ID_CUS, B.NAME AS NAME_CUS, B.PHONE_NUM AS PHONE_CUS, B.ADDRESS AS ADDRESS_CUS FROM transaction as A INNER JOIN user as B ON A.ID_CUS = B.ID

SELECT A.ID, A.ID_CUS, A.TYPE, A.START_DT, A.END_DT, A.CAR_NAME, A.CAR_COLOR, A.CAR_MODEL, A.CAR_NUM, A.CAR_ABOUT, A.FEE_EQUIP, A.FEE_WORK, A.FEE_TOTAL, A.STATUS, B.NAME as NAME_CUS, B.PHONE_NUM as PHONE_CUS, B.ADDRESS as ADDRESS_CUS FROM transaction as A INNER JOIN user as B ON A.ID_CUS = B.ID WHERE A.ID = #{ID}
SELECT A.QUANTITY_EQUIP, A.PRICE_TOTAL, B.IMAGE, B.NAME, B.ABOUT FROM trans_equip as A INNER JOIN equipment as B ON A.ID_EQUIP = B.ID WHERE A.ID_TRANS = #{ID}
